permissions.Name: User.Read
permissions.Description: Sign you in and read your profile
permissions.FullDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your organizational account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.

permissions.Name: Application.Read.All
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read all applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

permissions.Name: Application.ReadWrite.All
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants.

permissions.Name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
permissions.FullDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user.  Does not allow user or group deletion.
